name: Brawler from the Mage Guild
text:
1 Non-Link Spellcaster Monster
If you can Pendulum Summon Level 3 you can Pendulum Summon this face-up card in your Extra Deck. If this card is Link Summoned: You can Special Summon 1 "Mage Guild" monster from your Deck. You can only use this effect of "Brawler from the Mage Guild" once per turn. Once per turn: You can target 1 "Mage Guild" card you control; Destroy it, then add 1 "Mage Guild" Pendulum Monster from your Deck or GY to your Extra Deck face-up. If this card leaves the field you can place it in your Pendulum Zone.
pendulum_text: You cannot Summon monsters from the Extra Deck except Spellcasters. If you control a face-up "Master of the Mage Guild" (Quick Effect): You can shuffle 1 "Mage Guild" monster you control and 1 card your opponent controls into the Deck. You can only use this effect of "Brawler from the Mage Guild" once per turn.
